ygData.subject: Re: Brad comments
ygData.msgSnippet: For the most part on target in my opinion if a bit too pointed.  You are mistaken however about our ability to hit magic only creatures.  Magic gloves only
ygData.messageBody:
For the most part on target in my opinion if a bit too pointed. You are mistaken however about our ability to hit magic only creatures. Magic gloves only started working as a magic attack for anyone other then monks about 4 patches ago IE about 2 months ago before that it was weapons or songs and that was the only damage you did. Now if we have a magic instrument or gloves we can punch magic only for damage while using the instrument.

Adon
